content: Sebagai pemain yang udah ngikutin Honkai: Star Rail dari awal rilis, bisa dibilang game ini bener-bener beda dari yang lain. Grafisnya cakep banget, desain karakternya detail dan penuh gaya, dan setiap update selalu ngasih sesuatu yang bikin penasaran. Ceritanya juga nggak main-main—serius, kadang kayak nonton anime dengan plot twist yang nggak ketebak. Ditambah lagi, musik latarnya juga keren, cocok banget sama atmosfer di tiap planet atau area yang kita jelajahi.

content: game nya bagus banget... cmn kenapa akhir akhir ini gameplay sering ngeglitch ya, padahal HP ku juga baru beli, mohon diperbaiki

When I first saw this game, I genuinely loved it. Overtime, the game got worser and worser as power creep in the game started making old characters feel like a crutch to play as. Not to mention the constant increase in HP for endgame bosses that make fighting them feel worser without spending money for the new characters. The recent global passive for new characters sets a bad precedence that will ultimately ruin the game's fundamental design. I can't recommend this game for new players anymore.
clean_final: first saw genuinely loved overtime got worser worser power creep started making old characters feel crutch mention constant increase hp endgame bosses fighting feel worser without spending money new characters recent global passive new characters sets bad precedence ultimately ruin fundamental design recommend new players anymore

Game RPG turn-based yang solid dan sangat menghibur. Grafisnya memang memukau dan memberikan pengalaman visual yang menyenangkan. Alur ceritanya menarik dan mampu membuat pemain penasaran untuk terus mengikuti perkembangannya namun kebanyakan yappingnya. Sistem pertarungannya cukup strategis dan menawarkan kedalaman taktis yang baik, meskipun mungkin terasa familiar bagi pemain game sejenis. content: Penyakit Powercreep Gila

What a great game by Hovoverse. The gameplay is more simple in terms you dont need to have fast hand and good ping to be great in the end game (eq. Genshin Spiral Abyss). Just need to build your character and a bit of strategic. The story is great as always. As a F2P, i really enjoy with the reward (event, daily, new patch, etc). Overall if u like Turn-Based games then you should try Honkai Star Rail. Good job Hoyoverse, keep up the good work :D

content: Dari segi story sangat menarik perpaduan antara action, komedi ( yang ga terlalu maksain/spontan), dan drama, sudah disuguhi game ini.
